summary: When the villagers killed Constantin Tirescu, they thought it was justice. Vlad Cozma thinks it was murder. Now Constantin thinks pickles might go nice with blood.
cast: Catalin Paraschiv|Rudy Rosenfeld|Constantin Barbulescu|Roxana Guttman|Camelia Maxim|Adrian Donea|Dan Popa|Vlad Jipa|Zane Jarcu|Mircea Nicola|Neculai Relu Stingaciu
title: Strigoi
